name: WasteLessFood
0:
”Alexa, ask Waste Less Food how closely should I follow expiration dates?”
”What are some ideas to use up food?”
”How do I know if food is spoiled?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: waste less food
des: With 1.3 billion tons of food wasted each year, the annual cost of worldwide food waste has now reached $1 trillion! With over 90% of food wasted in the United States ending up in landfills, food waste has become one of the biggest contributors to greenhouse gases. If you're concerned about the environment, how about doing your part to reduce food waste? You can say "Alexa, open Waste Less Food" to launch the skill, and then you can ask Waste Less Food to recommend ways to reduce your own food waste when dealing with specific issues. For example, you can say "How closely should I follow expiration dates?" or "What are some ideas to reduce food waste?" or "How do I know if food is spoiled?" or "What are some ideas to use up food?" If the Waste Less Food skill hasn't been opened yet, you can also say in one shot, "Alexa, ask Waste Less Food how closely should I follow expiration dates?" or "Alexa, ask Waste Less Food how do I know if food is spoiled?" By following the recommendations provided by Waste Less Food, you can reduce your own food waste and do your part to reduce greenhouse gases and help the environment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
